InfluenceRule.name: More likely if r is still dating the homewrecker
Being cheated on very likely to cause this
if you love the cheater this is more likely
hard to get out of this

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %r% broke %ip% heart by cheating on %pron(i,him/her)% with %o%
%r% broke %ip% heart by cheating on %pron(i,him/her)% with %o% (and not liking %CKB_((i,likes),(r,dislikes),())%s)
%i% had lost interest in %r%, but it turned out %r% %pron(r,was/were)% actually already cheating on %pron(i,him/her)% anyway
%r% tried to take advantage of %ip% nice side, but still broke %pron(i,his/her)% heart
%r% tricked %i% into thinking those rumors %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% a cheater were false
%r% tried to maintain the friendship after cheating on %i%
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% too introverted to confront %r% about %pron(r,his/her)% cheating ways
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% too ridden with loneliness to let %rp% cheating behavior get in the way of %list(i,r,our/their)% relationship
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% too introverted to confront %r% about %pron(r,his/her)% cheating ways

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! Is it true you're cheating on me with %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh... uh... %random(you heard about that,how did you find out about that,I guess word travels fast,guess the secret's out)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You %pejorative%! You horrible, horrible %pejorative%. You...
You've broken by heart.
%r%! Is it true you're cheating on me with %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh... uh... %random(you heard about that,how did you find out about that,I guess word travels fast,guess the secret's out)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You %pejorative%! You horrible, horrible %pejorative%. You...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, %sweetie%, let me explain! %o% means nothing to me! I heart *you*.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Do... do you really mean that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Of course, %random(my darling,sweetheart,baby,angel)%. I'll break it off with %o%, you'll see.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So... I heard something today. An interesting rumor, although - I'm sure it's not true.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Eh... Er, so what is it %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That you're CHEATING ON ME with %o%!!
And to make things worse I just found out about your secret hatred for %toc1%s. YOU LIED TO ME! You told me you *loved* %toc1%s! How could you?
You've broken my heart. My %toc1% and I don't want to ever see you again.
I don't really know how to tell you this %r%... But I'm sorta losing interest in you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's okay, I've been cheating on you anyways.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: WHAT!? HOW COULD YOU!? Why would you ever break my heart like that!?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...What?? I thought you lost interest in me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh PLEASE! Don't try to weasel your way outta this! Get outta my sight!
Did you really think I could overlook this just because I'm a *nice* person!?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So you found out...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah I found out! How coud you cheat on me and break my heart like this!?
This is it, %r%. We're *over*!
Is it true %sweetie%? Are you seeing %o%? Why would you hurt me like that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What!? That's crazy. Who told you that, %sweetie%? You're my little honey-bunny bear! They're probably just jealous of us.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's really not true?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Cross my heart and hope to, uh, you know the rest!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %sweetie%! I'm sorry for doubting you! I *knew* it was just a rumor!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: We're friends, right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I thought so, but I've heard things lately...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Before you say anything else, I just have something on my chest, I really gotta get it off.
I've been cheating on you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: HOW COULD YOU BREAK MY HEART LIKE THAT!? 'We're *friends*'!? What kinda twisted, ugh! I can't believe you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I know, I know... Still friends though... right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Get lost!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %sweetie%...
%sweetie%...? Oh. A text.
'I know you're cheating on me. You've broken my heart. We're through.'
You wonder why I broke your heart? This is why. I can't maintain a relationship through *texts*!
NOPE! Don't even bother!
Hey %i%. I know I haven't been giving you as much attention as I should and you've been feeling lonely...
But that's becau-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I know. You're cheating on me.
It's alright though, I still really need you in my life - if only for a bit.
You've broken my heart, but the shattered remains don't outweigh my loneliness.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I see... I... I'm sorry.
